> <OLD>
>
> DINOBOT nodded, "As you say.  If there is a third assemblage of forces on
> this planet, with as extensive an army and a system as to set up this
> jamming zone, this underground facility, and also tracking us closely enough
> to capture our leaders, then for now they are a greater priority."

<NEW>

CRYOTEK nodded a frown on his face. CYCLONUS and SCOURGE were missing
and HYDRAS had been taken, RODIMUS lost or at least seemingly so.
There was still no sign of any of them.

All of them knew most of the forces at play, well at least the big
three. The PREDACONS the MAXIMALS and the MINIONS OF UNICRON. However
now there seemed to be another force at work and that was this new
enemy that they faced.

> <OLD>
>
> Pausing then a moment, "If the rodent remains with us, was he not a miner
> originally?  Perhpas he mgiht aid then in our explorations and digging."
> For had not his memory files given a vague recollection of Rattrap once
> stating he was the greatest miner in the Vega Cluster?

"Agreed." CRYOTEK said loking to see if he could spot RAT TRAP and
QUICKSTRIDE the two annoying MAXIMALS who had been so silent, almost
too silent the past few hours.

> <OLD>
>
> Tucson lightens his expression but it soon turns to one of concern.
>
> " That's all I wanted, thank you.  I've made a misjudgement, I apologize for
> my assumption.   Yet I do believe we better be on guard as to how this rumor
> got started.  Leo, it could be possible that you have been cloned, and that
> clone could have started this.   It's only a guess, but it does fit from
> what you've told me.  If Rodimus can be cloned, so can any of us.  Who
> knows, a black dragon could be out there tarnishing my reputation as we
> speak.  All right, I need to scan your systems and capture your schematics.
> Then I will attempt to seek out an outside match according to the intel I
> acquire from you.  I may not be blind but I still have my other senses that
> were there before I regained my sight.  It's a long shot but it should
> work."

<NEW>

LEO PRIME smiled as it seemed that finally TUCON was geting the point.
That is until he started talking about cloning and the need for a
scan, and then a look of shock and even outrage was appearing on LEO
PRIME's face. "What you think that I was cloned? What, when?"

As he talked there was a sudden commotion as the ground began to rumble . . .

> <OLD>
>
> At this point, DRILL BIT, and the others who had been hiding over
> underground trasnformed to robot mode and began racing forwards as fast as
> they could, without care for whom they might be trampling over in front of
> them!
>
> "Gang way gang way gang way!"  The group rushing forwards in disarray even
> as the cave seemed to be coming down about them!

As the cave in progressed large rocks and stone began to rain down on
the section of tunnel that the group was standing in. Tons of sand and
dirt began to pour in quickly filling it. Any who did not quickly run
further into the tunnel would quickly be caught in the wave of
destruction.

Needless to say CRYOTEK and PREDACON FUZORS were quick to make their get away.

LEO PRIME looked around alarm registering on his face. "Let's go
Maximals!" He cried out. "Further into the tunnel!"

"This could all be a trap" WING CALIBER said as he dodge a rather
large stone comming at him.

LEO PRIME nodded as he also began running urging them forward, "Yeah,
but at this point we have no choice."

The MAXIMAL FUZORS began to run forward as well. It was time to
exercise the better part of valor and retreat.

The whole tunnel continued to rumble and shake dangerously!

(TAG)

- Preston
